*Remove OTA validate [LAB] - Only support VAB series use, please do not open other series.\n- No need for internal testing qualification to flash into the full internal testing package.\n- Those who have internal testing permission will not be able to receive internal testing updates, and can be used to block system updates.\n- After cross-version type upgrade, it is recommended to clear data.\n- Unofficial ROM usage is not supported.

Allow screenshot Allow screenshot in software that does not allow to\nSupport adding drop-down quick setting on Control center for security Remove display over notification Remove \"This app is displaying over other apps\" notification Force small windows Ignore system blacklist and software prohibition of small windows Max wallpaper scale The wallpaper zoom magnification when the system desktop switch is applied Allow untrusted touches(It is not necessary to open on A13) Kill domain verification Prevents the system (and also yourself) from allowing apps to always open supported links.\nIt also enables you to open supported links in apps which are not "verified" on Android 12 and above. Unlocked multi freeform number limit Disable the verification of lock screen password every 72 hours Media volume steps Turning on may cause the scrolling of the volume bar to freeze or the Bluetooth volume to be abnormal
Always display Home screen clock When turned on, the clock will not be hidden on the status bar even if there is a clock widget Double tap to sleep Double-tap the blank space to sleep Disable wallpaper dimming This will disable the effect that the wallpaper will gradually brighten from dimming when going in and out of the recent task Modify the card marking animation Modify the animation effect of the recent task removal card Add freeform shortcut Restore google app icon Scroll app name The application name that is too long will be scrolled and displayed without any new line Show Real Use and Total Memory Hacking fake MIUI memory Mandatory all widget use miui widget animation Show MIUI widgets on the Classic widgets page Resizable miui widgets Remove restrictions on shortcuts Remove icon number restriction from dock Optimize unlock anim Medium icon round corner follow Unlock launcher icon grids Using the full width of the folder view Number of rows of icons in the folder view
Remove device restrictions It will be recognized as high-end by default. Turning this option on will not increase GPU performance overhead. Remove some logs at the same time. Complete blur Use the official half-finished complete blur feature Complete Blur Complement Complements blur when swiping up from the App, which may cause visual flicker Resume recent blur Example for MiPad6 Always blur launcher wallpaper Folder View Blur Enable Blur When Open Folder

Custom animation speed Set the animation speed in different scenarios separately Transition animation speed「When the app is turned on or off」 The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when the application is opened and closed Transition animation speed「In and out of the background」 The speed of the transition animation that takes effect when entering and exiting the most recent task
